about_the_game:
“River of Time Yarn” is a fixed value RPG. In the game. In the game, you need to observe the distribution of enemies, doors, items and analyze the map structure, and use their brains to find the right path to the next area. Battles with enemies are visually turn-based. You can release skills to achieve specific damage or effects. You will grow stronger in exploration and combat, defeating more powerful enemies. This game has a rich story and visual battle process. As the game progresses to different stages, you will acquire different skills.
At the beginning of the Spiritual Trouble, you will play the role of the Yanhuang leader against the fierce spirit beast, and improve your ability. You will lead your people out of trouble and open the way. On the way forward, you defeat all the enemies who stand in the way, reclaim the territory, and find the truth of the Spiritual Trouble.
